title: Bug 4974: Setting classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When attempting to set the output location and classpath in one operation, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations, which leads to an illegal state.
OB: When pressing 'Ok', an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest outputfolder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
EB: No error message should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Navigate to the settings page for setting the classpath and output location. 2. Set the classpath and output location in one operation. 3. Click 'Ok' to apply the changes.
